articles.title: Camilla cancels engagements following Covid diagnosis - goodtoknow
articles.description: Queen Consort Camilla has tested positive for Covid and has cancelled all her engagements this week
articles.content:
Camilla, Queen Consort, has cancelled all her upcoming royal engagements this week after testing positive for Covid, Buckingham Palace have announced.
